1.title: Kidnappings
1.plot: Aging PI Sam Aquino who's contemplating retirement, due to a competing company takes on a case involving Lisa, the daughter of Sandra, who's a close personal friend of Sam's assistant Donna, who's goes missing from their home. At the same time Sam's granddaughter Megan seeks help through Donna to obtain her adoption papers from her mother Christine.

2.title: 4 Companions
2.plot: Megan and her girlfriends visit their local coffee shop hangout, where Megan gets into an altercation with a local bully, but is aided by their friend, and coffee shop owner Jonathan. Still upset over her adoption papers, Megan then takes her frustrations out on her girlfriends, while Sam makes a personal visit to the Alliance Surveillance company to obtain clues about Lisa's disappearance.

3.title: Hidden Documents
3.plot: While Sam gets a visit from socialite Marjorie Rivers who hires Sam to follow her husband, Donna invites mother's Sandra, and Christine to lunch to discuss her gut feelings concerning Lisa's disappearance, and both their daughters. Christine finally has a long heart to heart talk with Megan that changes both their lives forever.

4.title: Rescue Plans
4.plot: Sam's assistant Donna tries to calm Sam, when he learns of Megan, and the girls plans to actively search for Lisa, which now appears to have been a kidnapping. Detective Hernandez shares some troubling Information with Sam, and Donna about other possible kidnappings linked to Alliance Surveillance, which causes Sam to contact his informant.

5.title: Wolf in Blue
5.plot: Viewers get to shadow Alliance Surveillance tech worker Steven Wilder as he goes about his regular day of work, meeting new clients, and up selling his employers products. And also his very lucrative side business he's involved in. Sam learns a little more about Herbert, and who he's involved with, while Megan and the girls are actively canvasing the streets looking for Lisa.

6.title: The Exchange
6.plot: With a lull in the Lisa kidnapping case, Sam follows up on Marjorie's husband Herbert, and investigates Megan's previous altercation at the coffee shop with Jonathan. But Sam is quickly forced into action, when sightings, phone calls, and information all come together at the same time concerning Lisa's kidnapping.

7.title: Reconciliation
7.plot: As the city's kidnapping case is broken up, with the help of Sam, Detective Hernandez, Donna, and the girls, an extremely nervous Megan with the help of her family, and close friends finally gets to meet Lisa, and her mother Sandra face to face, and welcome them into the family.

imdb.plot outline: Old fashioned private detective Sam Aquino is contemplating retirement due to the fact that a high tech surveillance firm who is operating nearby is slowly driving him out of business. But Sam is about to take on some cases that all intertwine with each other, especially involving his grand daughter Megan, her mother Christine, and Megan's three close girlfriends who are all now entering
